name: Suck DJS closing party at Kico Club (Postal Tickets)
description:
Firstly, we would just like to say thank you to you all for your kind words after we announced that Kico Club had been closed. 

We was as shocked as most of you and obviously upset by the news. You asked for one final night so we have arranged to hire out the venue and throw one final night at Kico Club, so we can give it a proper send off!

It has been a great 5 years and we have met a lot of good friends and John even met his now wife Lucy there also. So the place holds great memories for us too. We have shared many an awesome night with you all.

We have chosen to put the night on Saturday 24th November to give everyone plenty of notice as we know some of you have now moved away from Bolton as well. 

Please tell your friends and invite them along to the event, Kico has always felt like one big group of friends to us. So it would be great to see as many familiar faces as possible really. 

Tickets will be available soon at £3 each. 

Doors will open at 10:30pm so please come early and have a catch up with us before we get the party started!

Look forward to seeing you all and make sure you keep in touch with us, we are in the process of trying to get another night sorted!

Suck DJs

x
